content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to set reminders or have direct access to your device's calendar. But I can definitely help you remember to set a reminder for yourself!

Here's a suggestion:

* Pull out your phone or computer and open your calendar or reminder app.
* Create a new event or reminder for 2 pm today with the title "Volleyball Game - The Spikers".
* Set the reminder to go off 30 minutes to 1 hour before the game so you have time to get ready and head to the location.

That way, you'll get a reminder to head to your game and have a great time with your team, The Spikers!

If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask!
